tns:patch.author: Dare
tns:patch.description: Makes one event type to be linked to 1 color

script.lang: insert into AMP_CATEGORIES_STATE(id,category_id, used_category_id, single_select) select nextval('AMP_CATEGORIES_STATE_seq'),category_id, used_category_id,true from amp_categories_used where category_id=(select id from amp_category_class where keyName like 'event_type') and used_category_id = (select id from amp_category_class where keyName like 'event_color');
